title: Push-up
description: Push-ups are a basic exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. They can be done anywhere and require no equipment.

title: Squat
description: Squats are a lower body exercise that target the quads, hamstrings, and glutes. They can be performed with body weight or added resistance.

title: Lunges
description: Lunges are a great exercise for targeting the legs and glutes, helping to improve balance and strength.

title: Plank
description: Planks are an isometric exercise that engages the core muscles, helping to improve strength and stability.

title: Deadlift
description: Deadlifts target the posterior chain, including the back, glutes, and hamstrings, and are great for building overall strength.

title: Bench Press
description: The bench press targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps, and is a staple exercise for building upper body strength.

title: Bicep Curl
description: Bicep curls isolate the biceps, helping to build muscle in the upper arms.

title: Tricep Dips
description: Tricep dips are a bodyweight exercise that target the triceps, shoulders, and chest.

title: Shoulder Press
description: The shoulder press targets the shoulders, specifically the deltoid muscles, and can be done with dumbbells or a barbell.

title: Pull-up
description: Pull-ups are a classic upper body exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders.

title: Chin-up
description: Chin-ups are similar to pull-ups but with an underhand grip, placing more emphasis on the biceps.

title: Leg Press
description: The leg press machine targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes, offering a controlled leg workout.

title: Leg Curl
description: Leg curls specifically target the hamstrings and are often done on a machine.

title: Leg Extension
description: Leg extensions focus on the quads, helping to build strength and definition in the front of the legs.

title: Mountain Climbers
description: Mountain climbers are a dynamic bodyweight exercise that targets the core, shoulders, and legs while also providing a cardio challenge.

title: Jumping Jacks
description: Jumping jacks are a full-body exercise that increase cardiovascular endurance and work various muscle groups.

title: Burpees
description: Burpees are a high-intensity exercise that targets the entire body, combining a squat, push-up, and jump.

title: Russian Twists
description: Russian twists are a great exercise for working the obliques and improving core strength.

title: Sit-ups
description: Sit-ups are a classic abdominal exercise that primarily target the rectus abdominis muscles.

title: Crunches
description: Crunches are a common core exercise that target the abdominal muscles with a focus on the upper abs.

title: Superman
description: The Superman exercise targets the lower back, glutes, and shoulders by lifting the arms and legs off the ground.

title: Glute Bridge
description: The glute bridge works the glutes, hamstrings, and lower back by lifting the hips off the floor while lying on your back.

title: Kettlebell Swing
description: The kettlebell swing targets the hips, glutes, and core while providing a great cardiovascular workout.

title: Clean and Press
description: The clean and press is a full-body movement that targets the legs, back, shoulders, and arms.

title: Seated Row
description: The seated row targets the back muscles, specifically the lats and rhomboids, and can be done using a cable machine.

title: Lat Pulldown
description: The lat pulldown primarily targets the latissimus dorsi muscles in the back, helping to build width and strength.

title: Cable Tricep Pushdown
description: The cable tricep pushdown isolates the triceps and can be performed using a cable machine.

title: Cable Bicep Curl
description: Cable bicep curls target the biceps and provide constant tension throughout the movement.

title: Chest Fly
description: Chest flies are an isolation exercise that target the chest muscles, performed with dumbbells or on a machine.

title: Dumbbell Row
description: Dumbbell rows target the upper back, lats, and rear shoulders, and can be performed one arm at a time.

title: T-Bar Row
description: T-Bar rows are a compound exercise that target the back, shoulders, and arms.

title: Cable Chest Press
description: The cable chest press is an alternative to the bench press and targets the chest and triceps using a cable machine.

title: Face Pull
description: Face pulls target the rear deltoids and upper traps, helping to improve posture and shoulder health.

title: Hip Thrust
description: Hip thrusts focus on the glutes and hamstrings, and are great for building lower body strength.

title: Barbell Row
description: Barbell rows are a compound back exercise that target the lats, rhomboids, and rear deltoids.

title: Box Jump
description: Box jumps are a plyometric exercise that target the legs and improve explosive power.

title: Sumo Squat
description: Sumo squats are a variation of the squat that target the inner thighs, glutes, and quads.

title: Calf Raise
description: Calf raises target the calf muscles and can be performed standing or seated.

title: Farmer's Walk
description: The farmer's walk is a full-body exercise that targets the grip, shoulders, back, and legs.

title: Jump Rope
description: Jump rope is a cardiovascular exercise that helps to improve coordination and endurance while also toning the legs.

title: Medicine Ball Slam
description: Medicine ball slams are a high-intensity full-body exercise that helps to build strength and cardiovascular fitness.

title: Boxing
description: Boxing is a combat sport that improves strength, endurance, and coordination while providing a great cardiovascular workout.

title: Plyometric Push-up
description: Plyometric push-ups are a variation of the push-up that involve explosive movement, helping to build power in the chest and arms.

title: Turkish Get-up
description: The Turkish get-up is a full-body exercise that targets the core, shoulders, and legs, requiring a kettlebell or dumbbell.

title: Battle Rope Waves
description: Battle rope waves are a high-intensity exercise that improves cardiovascular fitness and targets the arms and shoulders.
